abstract: Slovakia defeats Belarus, 4-2, in Group B round-robin game in world junior hockey championship.
lead_paragraph: Lukas Hrusik broke a tie 19 seconds into the third period, and Slovakia defeated Belarus, 4-2.

headline.main: Slovakia Beats Belarus in World Juniors
headline.print_headline: Hockey; Slovakia Beats Belarus in World Juniors

snippet: Lukas Hrusik broke a tie 19 seconds into the third period, and Slovakia defeated Belarus, 4-2.
